name: San La Muerte / Bless your amulet
description:
Although it's a pagan cult, an amulet of San La Muerte should be blessed by a catholic priest. To do so, people hide the amulet under a small pad which holds a catholic figure. In most cases, priests know that they're blessing a San La Muerte's amulet but since the cult is so strong in certain regions of Argentina, Paraguay and Brazil, they might even believe in it and turn a blind eye.

This piece is part of my contribution to "Our Myths" event held by Chen >>> https://www.hicetnunc.xyz/objkt/365336
